arts.ttl: Canada forward Jonathan David scores on Serie A debut as Juventus wins, Pisa draws at Atalanta
arts.sum: The 25-year-old David scored 25 goals and provided 12 assists in 49 matches across all competitions for Lille last season. Canada forward Jonathan David scored in his Serie A debut to set Juventus on the way to a 2-0 win over Parma in their season opener on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Atalanta 1-1 Pisa: Scamacca not enough for disappointing Dea
arts.sum: Gianluca Scamacca scored his first Serie A goal in over a year, but Atalanta began...

arts.ttl: Juricâ€™s Atalanta reign begins against Pisa
arts.sum: Two teams with different objectives and two new head coaches who want to make a strong start: Atalanta and Pisa meet at the Stadio di Bergamo looking to get off on the right foot. Pisa returns to Serie A after 35 seasons: the last appearance had been in the 1990/91 season and that year the Tuscans won the first two days of the championship, gaining first place.

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.
